title: HOW MUCH COULD YOU HELP?
infoContent: This is an interactive landing page with a 3D sphere. Move your mouse or touch the screen to interact with the interface. After 5 seconds of inactivity, the menu will expand.
settingsContent: Configure your preferences here. You can adjust various options to customize your experience.
sphereDescription: This is an interactive 3D sphere rendered using Three.js. It rotates continuously and responds to user interactions.
sphereDetails: Click on the sphere to learn more about its properties and behavior.
aboutContent: This is the about section. It explains what this application does and who made it.
